coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the can reads 'Canned by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Cotton Candy Soda
coreAttributes.description: A large translucent plastic cup of blue raspberry cotton candy flavored soda. The label depicts a raccoon-boy in a lab coat dangling a wad of cotton candy over a bowl of carbonated water.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] the cup of Cotton Candy Soda up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. The smell of sugar and raspberries rises from the straw, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(wrap)] [npc.her] lips around it and [npc.verb(start)] sucking down the tingly liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] much more refreshed.
